ovdesc.p: A list of codes used by the system to provide enrichment text to system actions for display on LMM.HISTORY.LIST. The codes are hard-coded within the system and are mandatory. For this reason a list is supplied with British text only which can be amended.

desc.p: The action code number. The input of these codes are a necessity, and a list of them will be provided at installation.
